H0.text: What kind of flowers was the gunman holding when he shot Dirty Den in Eastenders. Tulips

H1.text: What kind of flowers was the gunman holding when he shot Dirty Den in Eastenders. Daisies

H2.text: What kind of flowers was the gunman holding when he shot Dirty Den in Eastenders. Lilies

H3.text: What kind of flowers was the gunman holding when he shot Dirty Den in Eastenders. Narkoa

A4.text: The gunman was carrying a gun concealed in a bunch of daffodils.
